name: Magician's Scales (Skill Card)
text:
Sartorius / Skill
[ACTIVATION]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.

[EFFECT]
Once per Duel, you can Tribute 1 "Arcana Force" monster and add 1 Normal Spell from your Deck to your hand, also for the rest of the Duel, you cannot Summon any monsters, except "Arcana Force" monsters.
